member.name: P:Telerik.XamarinForms.DataVisualization.Gauges.GaugeTextIndicator.HorizontalTextPlacement
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates the horizontal placement of the text. This property is taken into consideration only when the indicator is in a radial or a horizontal gauge.

member.name: P:Telerik.XamarinForms.DataVisualization.Gauges.GaugeTextIndicator.VerticalTextPlacement
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates the vertical placement of the text. This property is taken into consideration only when the indicator is in a radial or a vertical gauge.

member.name: P:Telerik.XamarinForms.DataVisualization.Gauges.GaugeBarIndicator.GradientStops
member.summary: Gets the collection of gradient stops in accordance to which the bar is painted. The Offset property of the gradient stop is treated in respect to the IsOffsetRelative property value of the indicator.

member.name: P:Telerik.XamarinForms.DataVisualization.Gauges.GaugeBarIndicator.IsOffsetRelative
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the Offset property of the gradient stops should be treated as a relative value between 0 and 1 or an absolute value in respect to the axis range.

member.name: P:Telerik.XamarinForms.DataVisualization.Gauges.GaugeRangeBarIndicator.GradientStops
member.summary: Gets the collection of gradient stops in accordance to which the bar is painted. The Offset property of the gradient stop is treated in respect to the IsOffsetRelative property value of the indicator.

member.name: P:Telerik.XamarinForms.DataVisualization.Gauges.GaugeRangeBarIndicator.IsOffsetRelative
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the Offset property of the gradient stops should be treated as a relative value between 0 and 1 or an absolute value in respect to the axis range.

member.name: P:Telerik.XamarinForms.DataVisualization.Gauges.GaugeShapeIndicator.Size
member.summary: Gets or sets the absolute size of the indicator.

member.name: P:Telerik.XamarinForms.DataVisualization.Gauges.GaugeShapeIndicator.Shape
member.summary: Gets or sets the path geometry that represents the shape of the indicator. At run-time this geometry is positioned in accordance to the Position and Offset properties and is scaled in accordance to the Size property. In order for the shape to be positioned and scaled properly the positions of the provided geometry must be normalized between 0 and 1. The pivotal point of the shape is considered to be its center, i.e. (0.5, 0.5). The orientation of the indicator is considered to be from (1.0, 0.5) to its center.

member.name: P:Telerik.XamarinForms.DataVisualization.Gauges.GaugeAxisBase.TickOffset
member.summary: Gets or sets the distance between the tick and axis line.

member.name: P:Telerik.XamarinForms.DataVisualization.Gauges.GaugeAxisBase.TickThickness
member.summary: Gets or sets the thickness of the tick. When this value is invalid/negative the ticks get the same thickness as the axis line.

member.name: P:Telerik.XamarinForms.DataVisualization.Gauges.GaugeAxisBase.TickPosition
member.summary: Gets or sets the position of the tick with respect to the axis line.

member.name: P:Telerik.XamarinForms.DataVisualization.Gauges.GaugeAxisBase.LabelOffset
member.summary: Gets or sets the distance between the label and axis line.

member.name: P:Telerik.XamarinForms.DataVisualization.Gauges.GaugeAxisBase.LabelFormat
member.summary: Gets or sets the numeric string format that is applied to the labels.

member.name: P:Telerik.XamarinForms.DataVisualization.Gauges.GaugeAxisBase.LabelInterval
member.summary: Gets or sets the label interval that specifies that one in n labels is visible.

member.name: P:Telerik.XamarinForms.DataVisualization.Gauges.GaugeAxisBase.Stroke
member.summary: Gets or sets the color of the axis line and ticks. This value is applied to the axis ticks only when the TickStroke value is the default Color.Default value.

member.name: P:Telerik.XamarinForms.DataVisualization.Gauges.GaugeAxisBase.StrokeThickness
member.summary: Gets or sets the thickness of the axis line and ticks. This value is applied to the axis ticks only when the TickThickness value is invalid/negative.

member.name: P:Telerik.XamarinForms.DataVisualization.Gauges.GaugeAxisBase.TickStroke
member.summary: Gets or sets the stroke of the ticks. When this value is Color.Default the ticks get the same color as the axis line.

member.name: P:Telerik.XamarinForms.DataVisualization.Gauges.GaugeAxisBase.LabelPosition
member.summary: Gets or sets the position of the label with respect to the axis line.

member.name: P:Telerik.XamarinForms.DataVisualization.Gauges.GaugeNeedleIndicator.Shape
member.summary: Gets or sets the path geometry that represents the shape of the needle. At run-time this geometry is scaled so that its width fits the diameter of the radial gauge (Position and Offset are also taken into account). In order for the needle to be positioned properly the positions of the provided geometry must be normalized between 0 and 1. The center of the needle is considered to be in the center of the normalized rectangle, i.e. (0.5, 0.5). The orientation of the needle is considered to be at 0 degrees from its center, i.e. the tip of the needle is at (1.0, 0.5).

member.name: P:Telerik.XamarinForms.DataVisualization.Gauges.RadRadialGauge.StartAngle
member.summary: Gets or sets the angle from which the arc starts. Regardless of the SweepDirection, the start angle is treated as in trigonometry - a positive rotation is a counter-clockwise rotation.

member.name: P:Telerik.XamarinForms.DataVisualization.Gauges.RadRadialGauge.SweepAngle
member.summary: Gets or sets the angle that defines the length of the arc.

member.name: P:Telerik.XamarinForms.DataVisualization.Gauges.RadRadialGauge.SweepDirection
member.summary: Gets or sets the sweep direction of the arc. The value of this property does not affect the direction of the start angle.

member.name: P:Telerik.XamarinForms.DataVisualization.Gauges.RadRadialGauge.AxisRadiusFactor
member.summary: Gets or sets a value between 0 and 1 that indicates the size of the radius of the arc in respect to the size of the gauge. All gauge elements use the arc as a pivotal element and position and offset themselves in accordance to the arc.

member.name: P:Telerik.XamarinForms.DataVisualization.Gauges.RadGaugeBase.Axis
member.summary: Gets or sets the axis. The axis handles axis line, ticks and labels logic. It dictates the mapping between the absolute and relative values so that gauge elements can be properly positioned.

member.name: P:Telerik.XamarinForms.DataVisualization.Gauges.RadGaugeBase.Ranges
member.summary: Gets or sets the definition entity which encapsulates ranges specific information such as Position, Offset, StartThickness and other properties that apply to all ranges in a gauge.

member.name: M:Telerik.XamarinForms.DataVisualization.Gauges.RadGaugeBase.OnBindingContextChanged
member.summary: Invoked whenever the binding context of the element changes. Propagates the binding context to its child elements.

member.name: T:Telerik.XamarinForms.DataVisualization.Gauges.GaugeRangesDefinition
member.summary: A class that encapsulates ranges specific information such as Position, Offset, StartThickness and other properties that apply to all ranges in a gauge.

member.name: P:Telerik.XamarinForms.DataVisualization.Gauges.GaugeRangesDefinition.Position
member.summary: Gets or sets the position of the ranges with respect to the axis line.

member.name: P:Telerik.XamarinForms.DataVisualization.Gauges.GaugeRangesDefinition.Offset
member.summary: Gets or sets the distance between the range and axis line.

member.name: P:Telerik.XamarinForms.DataVisualization.Gauges.GaugeRangesDefinition.StartThickness
member.summary: Gets or sets the start thickness of the ranges segment.

member.name: P:Telerik.XamarinForms.DataVisualization.Gauges.GaugeRangesDefinition.EndThickness
member.summary: Gets or sets the end thickness of the ranges segment.

member.name: M:Telerik.XamarinForms.DataVisualization.Gauges.GaugeRangesDefinition.OnBindingContextChanged
member.summary: Invoked whenever the binding context of the element changes. Propagates the binding context to its child elements.

member.name: T:Telerik.XamarinForms.DataVisualization.Gauges.GaugeGradientRange
member.summary: A gauge range that works with gradient stops. The range is drawn by gradually transitioning from one color to another.

member.name: P:Telerik.XamarinForms.DataVisualization.Gauges.GaugeGradientRange.GradientStops
member.summary: Gets the collection of gradient stops in accordance to which the range is painted. The Offset property of the gradient stop is treated in respect to the IsOffsetRelative property value of the range.

member.name: P:Telerik.XamarinForms.DataVisualization.Gauges.GaugeGradientRange.IsOffsetRelative
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the Offset property of the gradient stops should be treated as a relative value between 0 and 1 or an absolute value in respect to the axis range.

member.name: P:Telerik.XamarinForms.DataVisualization.Gauges.GaugeIndicatorBase.Position
member.summary: Gets or sets the position of the indicator with respect to the axis line.

member.name: P:Telerik.XamarinForms.DataVisualization.Gauges.GaugeIndicatorBase.Offset
member.summary: Gets or sets the distance between the indicator and axis line.
